about_the_game:
The new unit "Serena Artemisia" has been unlocked and will join the Clausewitz Battalion.

As starter items, she comes with the following equipment:
- Amber Eye: Unit field of vision +20%
- Blessed Talisman: Attack Power +2, Defense +2
- Bespoke Glasses: Accuracy +2%
detailed_description:
The new unit "Serena Artemisia" has been unlocked and will join the Clausewitz Battalion.

As starter items, she comes with the following equipment:

- Blessed Talisman: Attack Power +2, Defense +2
- Bespoke Glasses: Accuracy +2%
